description: Rain Man Casino Strategy App - MVP focusing on blackjack strategy

userStories.title: Initialize Next.js frontend with Tailwind
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the frontend scaffolding set up with dark casino theme.
acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14 app created in /frontend with App Router
Tailwind CSS configured with dark theme colors (#1a1a2e bg, #0f3d3e felt green, #ffc107 gold)
Basic layout component with header
npm run dev works without errors
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Create home page with game navigation
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see available games and navigate to each section.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page at / with Rain Man branding
Navigation cards for: Blackjack, Craps, Poker, Bankroll
Cards have hover effects and casino aesthetic
Mobile responsive layout
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Build blackjack strategy data structure
userStories.description: As a developer, I need the complete basic strategy chart data.
acceptanceCriteria: Create /frontend/lib/blackjack-strategy.ts
Complete basic strategy for hard totals (5-21)
Complete basic strategy for soft totals (A,2 through A,9)
Complete basic strategy for pairs
Actions: H (hit), S (stand), D (double), P (split), Ds (double/stand)
Data structured by player hand and dealer upcard (2-A)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Build interactive blackjack strategy chart
userStories.description: As a user, I want to look up the correct play for any blackjack hand.
acceptanceCriteria: Page at /blackjack/strategy
Visual chart showing all hands vs dealer upcards
Color coded: green=stand, red=hit, yellow=double, blue=split
Tapping a cell shows explanation of the play
Mobile friendly - scrollable/zoomable
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Build blackjack hand lookup tool
userStories.description: As a user, I want to quickly input my hand and get the correct play.
acceptanceCriteria: Input section above or beside the chart
Select your two cards (dropdowns or card buttons)
Select dealer's upcard
Instantly shows: recommended action + brief explanation
Highlights the corresponding cell in the chart
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Add blackjack training mode
userStories.description: As a user, I want to practice basic strategy with flashcards.
acceptanceCriteria: Page at /blackjack/trainer
Shows random hand + dealer upcard
User selects action (Hit/Stand/Double/Split)
Shows correct/incorrect feedback
Tracks session accuracy percentage
Option to focus on problem areas (hands you miss)
Typecheck passes
